description: This file contains unit tests for the FrameType class, specifically testing buffer setting/getting, copying, and other operations, using the Google Test framework.

classes.name: FrameType
classes.description: A template class likely representing a data frame with buffer management and serialization capabilities.

methods.name: SetBuffer
methods.description: Sets data in the FrameType buffer at specified offset.

methods.name: GetBuffer
methods.description: Retrieves data from the FrameType buffer.

methods.name: Size
methods.description: Sets or gets the size of the frame data.

methods.name: Clear
methods.description: Resets the frame data to an empty state.
